mapper.select: SELECT mbsp_id FROM mbsp_tbl WHERE mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mbsp_tbl( mbsp_id, mbsp_name, mbsp_email, mbsp_password, mbsp_zipcode, mbsp_addr, mbsp_deaddr, mbsp_phone, mbsp_nick) VALUES (#{mbsp_id}, #{mbsp_name}, #{mbsp_email}, #{mbsp_password}, #{mbsp_zipcode}, #{mbsp_addr}, #{mbsp_deaddr}, #{mbsp_phone}, #{mbsp_nick} )
